verses.verse: Yahweh,<WH3068> how my adversaries<WH6862> have increased!<WH7231> Many<WH7227> are those who rise up against me.<WH6965>
Many<WH7227> there are who say<WH559> of my soul,<WH5315> "There is no help<WH3444> for him in God.<WH430>" Selah.<WH5542>
But you,<WH3068> Yahweh, are a shield<WH4043> around me,<WH3519> my glory, and the one who lifts up<WH7311> my head.<WH7218>
I cry<WH7121> to Yahweh<WH3068> with my voice,<WH6963> and he answers<WH6030> me out of his holy<WH6944> hill.<WH2022> Selah.<WH5542>
I laid myself down<WH7901> and slept.<WH3462> I awakened;<WH6974> for Yahweh<WH3068> sustains me.<WH5564>
I will not be afraid<WH3372> of tens of thousands<WH7233> of people<WH5971> who have set<WH7896> themselves against me on every side.<WH5439>

Arise,<WH6965> Yahweh!<WH3068> Save<WH3467> me,<WH430> my God! For you have struck<WH5221> all of my enemies<WH341> on the cheek bone.<WH3895> You have broken<WH7665> the teeth<WH8127> of the wicked.<WH7563>
Salvation<WH3444> belongs to Yahweh.<WH3068> Your blessing<WH1293> be on your people.<WH5971> Selah.<WH5542>
